original_text: For then shall be great tribulation, such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time, no, nor ever shall be.
korean_text: 이는 그 때에 큰 환난이 있겠음이라 창세로부터 지금까지 이런 환난이 없었고 후에도 없으리라

sentences.original_text: For then shall be great tribulation
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때에는 큰 환난이 있을 것이니

sentences.original_text: such as was not since the beginning of the world

sentences.korean_translation: 아니요, 앞으로도 결코 있지 않을 것입니다
